steps.name: the title of the page should be "Demo Site"

elements.name: Do a movie search and continue to it's details page

steps.name: that we know the element with the "id" named "search-field" as "input"
that we know the element with the "xpath" named "html/body/div/div/div[3]/div[1]/div/div/p[2]/a" as "button"
that we know the element with the "css" named "[class='media-title'] > a" as "title"
the text of the element "title" should be "Fargo"
that we know the element with the "id" named "back-btn" as "back"

elements.name: Do a series search and continue to it's details page, and then to the season page

steps.name: that we know the angular element with the "model" named "type" as "radio"
that we know the element with the "id" named "search-field" as "input"
that we know the element with the "xpath" named "html/body/div/div/div[3]/div/div/div/p[2]/a" as "button"
that we know the element with the "css" named "[class='media-title'] > a" as "title"
the text of the element "title" should be "True Detective"
that we know the angular element with the "model" named "season" as "season-search"
that we know the element with the "id" named "season-search" as "search-button"
that we know the element with the "id" named "go-to-season" as "go"
that we know the angular element with the "repeater" named "episode in seasonData.Episodes" as "episodes"
there should be 8 elements in repeater element "episodes"
that we know the element with the "id" named "back-btn" as "back"
that we know the angular element with the "options" named "types.name for types in types.availableTypes track by types.id" as "favorites"

arguments.val: types.name for types in types.availableTypes track by types.id

steps.name: that we know the element with the "id" named "favorites-button" as "button"
that we know the angular element with the "repeater" named "movie in movies" as "movies"
there should be 5 elements in repeater element "movies"
that we know the angular element with the "options" named "types.name for types in types.availableTypes track by types.id" as "favorites"

arguments.val: types.name for types in types.availableTypes track by types.id

steps.name: that we know the element with the "id" named "favorites-button" as "button"
that we know the angular element with the "repeater" named "movie in movies" as "series"
there should be 5 elements in repeater element "series"

name: Auto tests of the Demo Site

steps.name: that we know the element with the "id" named "favorites-button" as "button"
the first cell in the table should be "Fargo"
that we know the angular element with the "model" named "search" as "input1"
that we know the element with the "id" named "search-field" as "input2"
that we know the angular element with the "binding" named "search" as "search"
the text of the angular element "search" should be "You are searching for a MOVIE:"

arguments.val: You are searching for a MOVIE:

steps.name: that we know the element with the "id" named "search-field" as "input"
input "Men in Black" to the element "input"
the text of the angular element "search" should be "You are searching for a MOVIE: Men in Black"

arguments.val: You are searching for a MOVIE: Men in Black

steps.name: that we know the angular element with the "options" named "types.name for types in types.availableTypes track by types.id" as "radio-options"

arguments.val: types.name for types in types.availableTypes track by types.id

steps.name: the text of the 1st element of "radio-options" should be "movies"
the text of the 2nd element of "radio-options" should be "series"
that we know the angular element with the "repeater" named "movie in movies" as "movies"
that we know the repeater element "movie in movies" as "movies" with row 1
the text of the angular element "movies" should be "Fargo 1996 Crime, Drama, Thriller 98 min 8.2"
that we know the repeater element "movie in movies" as "movies" with row 1 and column 2
the text of the angular element "movies" should be "1996"

name: Testing and demoing the application on the angular demo site
